Package org.chat.shared

Class Summary
ChatListMessage this message contains the list of chats that are currently made the constructor retrieves the list right from the SQL server
ErrorMessage this is a message to send any errors back to the client if they need to be handled there
Message this is the superclass of messages, it just has a type which is the one thing that should be common among all messages These classes are just wrappers for the messages, they are intended to be used by beans and made into JOSNObjecs
SuccessMessage  
TextMessage Text messages are the actual text chats that clients send to other clients
UserListMessage This kind of message is designed to send a list of users in a particular chat room.
